posts.title: USB Computer Fan
posts.content: Fear not the next time the A/C goes out because the USB computer fan will keep you nice and cool while you use your <del>pornbox</del> computer. This pint-sized fan plugs into your USB port and provides a steady breeze you can point in any direction.

posts.title: Zombie Slippers
posts.content: Keep your feet warm inside the heads of decapitated zombies with these creepily realistic zombie slippers. These slippers are created to look like real zombie heads, with popping out eyes, blue-toned skin, and blood soaked teeth.

posts.title: Sriracha Cookbook
posts.content: Put your taste buds and fragile anus through the ring of fire by preparing meals with help from the sriracha cookbook. You’ll have dozens of fiery recipes at your disposal so no matter what you’re in the mood to eat, you can season it with sriracha!

posts.title: Chalkboard Coffee Mug
posts.content: Unleash your artistic talents during your coffee break by sipping your piping hot cup of Joe from this chalkboard coffee mug. The mug’s exterior is coated with a thin chalkboard layer and comes with a pair of chalk sticks so that you can doodle while your drink.

posts.title: One Touch Wine Aerator
posts.content: Pouring the perfect glass of wine is as easy as pressing a button when you use the one touch wine aerator. It provides more air contact surface to speed oxidation than any other aerator and requires no lifting or aiming to pour.

posts.title: Glitter Nail Polish
posts.content: Spice up your next manicure by opting for the glitter nail polish instead of the old fashioned french manicure. This bold shade of nail polish contains a multicolored glitter shade that leaves nails bright and vibrant – it’s like a party in a bottle.

posts.title: Light Up Ice Cubes
posts.content: Make your drinks look as good as they taste by giving them some flair with these light up ice cubes. Apart from preventing your drink from becoming watered-down, they feature embedded LEDs that you can set to one of eight lighting modes.

posts.title: Color Wheel Umbrella
posts.content: Brighten up a bleak rainy day instantly by keeping yourself dry under this color wheel umbrella. The umbrella features an elegant wooden hook handle along with a vibrant rainbow motif that’ll turn heads wherever you go.

posts.title: Darth Vader Cookie Jar
posts.content: Come to the Dark side – we have cookies! This geeky Star Wars themed Darth Vader cookie jar keeps your delicious cookies and snacks always within a Jedi’s reach, in a container that would please any galaxy dweller – even if they are Rebel scum!

posts.title: Ninjabread Men Cookie Cutters
posts.content: Regular ginger bread men are so old, cliché, and lame. With this cookie cutter mold you can create the coolest cookies in existence: ninjabread men cookies! Three attack poses are included in this cookie cutter set of ninjabread men.

posts.title: Magnetic Dart Board
posts.content: This magnetic dart board delivers all the fun of the classic bar game without the risk of losing an eye. The tips of each dart come with a small yet powerful magnet that easily sticks onto the metallic board upon making contact.

posts.title: Shot In The Pint Drinking Glasses
posts.content: Be prepared for any alcoholic beverage that comes your way by having this shot in the pint drinking glass gripped firmly in your hand. It stands 7 inches tall and offers both a 16 ounce pint glass ideal for beer and a 2 ounce shot glass when you flip it over.
